c74object.name: o.listchange
c74object.description: Output a list only if it is different from the stored list and will reset the stored list to that differing input list.

inlet.digest: Repeated to Output if List Changes
inlet.description: Note that o.listchange only compares whole lists and not individual items in lists.

outlet.description: Note that o.listchange only compares whole lists and not individual items in lists.

objarg.name: initial-list
objarg.description: Sets the initial list for comparison to incoming lists. If there is no argument, there is no initial list for comparison.

method.name: list
method.description: The list is sent out the outlet only if it is different from the currently stored list. Replaces the stored list.

method.name: clear
method.description: Resets the stored list without triggering output.

method.name: set
method.description: Replaces the stored list without triggering output.

attribute.name: maxsize
attribute.description: Maximum number of items to process. If the input list exceeds this size, excess items will be truncated.

entry.name: int
entry.description:
Out left outlet: The number received in the inlet is sent out only if it is different from the stored value.
Out middle outlet: If the stored value is 0 and the input is not 0, 1 is sent out; otherwise nothing is sent out.
Out right outlet: If the stored value is not 0 and the input is 0, 1 is sent out; otherwise nothing is sent out.
